profile.name: Martin Schürrer
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at PSPDFKit
profile.summary: Highly skilled software engineer with expertise in multiple programming languages and technologies. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions, with a strong focus on collaboration and innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at PSPDFKit
description: Led the development of Elixir-based job processing with PostgreSQL, resulting in a 30% increase in system performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement cloud-native applications using WebAssembly and Java for multithreaded tc-junit4.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple React apps with Box annotations, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement.
Created pub/sub and logging backends using Elixir, demonstrating expertise in distributed systems.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of various Elixir projects, including a popular logging backend.
Participated in code reviews and ensured high-quality standards were met.
